entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the one who grabbed Mrs. Cattermole and disappeared.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is described as a colleague of the balding wizard and is confused about what's happening.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who sees Yaxley's head turn and an inkling of truth dawn in his face.

entities.name: reg cattermole
entities.description: Reg Cattermole is described as the real person whose wife was grabbed by Ron.

entities.name: mr. cattermole
entities.description: Mr. Cattermole is described as a wizard who was punched and is confused about what's happening.

entities.name: the balding wizard
entities.description: The balding wizard is described as someone whose colleagues set up an uproar.

relationships.description: Ron grabbed Mrs. Cattermole and disappeared.
Yaxley looked from Harry to the punched wizard.
Reg Cattermole is described as the real person whose wife was grabbed by Ron.
